683:1: atha tā devatā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ sarvāṃśca bodhisattvāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhāṃśca triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya śirasā praṇamya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ nirīkṣamāṇāḥ sthitāḥ abhūvaṃ nirīkṣamāṇāḥ samantratantrakalpavistarāṇi ca |
683:2: bhāṣante sma svamudrāṇāṃ cauṣadhyo yathābhimataṃ bhāṣante sma |
683:3: anujñātā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksambuddhena sattvānāmarthāya sarvamudrāmantrapaṭalavisaraṃ bhāṣate sma svakaṃ svakaṃ mudrāpaṭalamoṣadhīnāṃ ca kalpaṃ bhāṣante sma ||
683:4: tumburuḥ sārthavāho evamāha - “ādau tāvad gandhena hastāvudvartya candanamiśreṇa vānyairvā sugandhajātibhirdevīnāmagrataḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitvodaṅmukho vā vāmahastena dakṣiṇahastāṅguṣṭhaṃ muṣṭiyogena gṛhītvā avasavyena bhrāmayitvā nābhideśe sthāpayet |
683:6: eṣa bhagavaṃ ! tumbureḥ sārthavāhasya samayamudrā mama |
683:7: tadeva hastau karmārthasādhakā vāmahastenāṅguṣṭhamabhyantare prakṣipya dṛḍhaṃ pragṛhya muṣṭiyogena nābhideśe nyaset |
683:8: eṣa bhagavaṃ ! mama jayāyā mudrā sarvakarmakarā |
683:11: eṣa dvitīyo mahāmudraḥ dvitīyamaṅgulimutkṣipya paścimāṃ diśi māvarjayet |
683:12: eṣa dvitīyo mahāmudraḥ sarvaduṣṭā nāgāṃ stambhayati nirviṣīkaraṇe ca prayoktavyaḥ |
683:13: tṛtīyamaṅgulimutkṣipya uttarāyāṃ diśi āvarjayet sarvayakṣayakṣīkinnaramahoragakūṣmāṇḍāśca vaśyā bhavanti |
683:17: caturthamaṅguliṃ vikāsya abhyantarasthitamaṅguṣṭhaṃ saṅkocya hastatale pūrvāyāṃ diśi āvarjayet |
683:23: dvau hastau saṃyamya sarvamaṅguliṃ vikāsya añjalyākāreṇa mūrdhanyāspṛśet |
683:29: etadeva bhagavaṃ ! pañca mahāmudrā sarvakāmaphalapradā bhavatī” ti ||
683:30: vijayāṃ evamāha - “pañca eva bhagavaṃ ! mama mahāmudrā bhavanti |
683:31: vāmahastenāṅguṣṭhābhyantaraṃ kṛtvā yathā nakhā na dṛśyante tathā kāryaṃ dṛḍhaṃ muṣṭiṃ kṛtvā prahāramārjanayogenādhaḥ avalokayet |
683:36: eta eva pañcamahāmudrā sarvakāmaphalapradā bhavanti” iti ||
683:37: ajitā evamāha - “ubhau hastau saṃyamya ubhau aṅguṣṭhamadhye prakṣipya suṣirañjalyākāraṃ kṛtvā madhyamāṅgulisūcikau kanyasāṅgulimucchritau pāśākāraṃ kṛtvā tarjanyau tathaiva cānāmikāvavaṣṭabhya ajitā nāma mahāmudrā bhavati |
683:47: eta eva pañcamahāmudrāḥ sarvāśāpāripūrakā bhavanti iti ||
683:48: aparājitā evamāha - “pañca eva bhagavaṃ mama mahāmudrā bhavanti |
683:50: tenaiva vidhinā yathā sādhane'smiṃ tathā yojyāḥ |
683:51: dakṣiṇābhimukhaṃ sthitvā devīnāmagrataḥ ubhau hastau saṃśliṣya madhyamānāmikātarjanyādibhiḥ trisūcyākāraṃ tṛśūlaṃ kṛtvā kaniṣṭhikāṅgulimadhyamaṅguṣṭhau ca madhye prakṣipya hastatale'smiṃ mūrdhni sthāne tadā nyaset |
683:52: prathamaṃ mahāmudraḥ aparājitā nāma evaṃ sarve prayoktavyāḥ |
683:54: yannāmikā bhaginyaḥ bhrātṛsahitāḥ tannāmakāḥ sarveṣāṃ mahāmudrā bhavanti |
683:56: yadetadaṅguṣṭhaṃ yad bhrātustumburoḥ yadetadaṅgulyaḥ sarve bhaginyaḥ anupūrvasaṃjñakāḥ |
683:57: tarjanī jayā madhyamā vijayā anāmikā ajitā kanyasā aparājitā |
683:63: tumburuḥ sārthavāha evamāha - “atheṣāṃ sāmānyataḥ agadābhidhānaṃ bhavati |
683:64: asmākaṃ ca oṣadhīnāṃ prabhāvo yena vaśyā bhavanti sarvabhūtāḥ |
683:66: aśvatthanyagrodhaśuṅgāṃ gṛhītvā kṣīreṇa pīṣayitvā gokṣīreṇāloḍya sitapakṣe aśvininakṣatreṇa induvāre tithau saptamyāṃ pūrvāhne ṛtumatyāḥ striyāyā aprasavanadharminyāḥ sārthavāhamantreṇa parijapya saptavārāṃ tathaiva mudrāṃ badhvā pāyayet pūrvābhimukhāṃ kṛtvā nārī garbhaṃ graheṣyate |
683:67: putraṃ janayate dīrghāyuṣyaṃ supatinā ca saha svaptavyam |
683:68: teṣāmeva mūlaṃ gṛhītvā mūlanakṣatreṇottarāyāṃ diśi gatāyāṃ śilāyāmādityavāreṇa sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet |
683:69: yasya dadāti sa vaśo bhavati āhārapānabhojanādiṣu gandhamālyatāmbulādiṣu prayoktavyam |
683:72: tadeva śuṅgau tenaiva vidhinā yathā striyā tathātmanā pibet |
683:75: gorjarukaḥ śatapādī vā naraśakraphalāni tathaiva cūrṇamidaṃ payasā saha peyaṃ yasya gṛhe pramadāśatamasti |
683:76: evamanena prakāreṇa pūrvamūlāṃ svamudrāṃ mantreṇopetāḥ varjayitvā viṣamupaviṣaṃ ca sarvaṃ yojyam |
683:77: sarvakarmiṣu ca sarvabhūtānāṃ vaśīkaraṇamuttamaṃ sādhanīyāśce” ti ||
683:78: jayā evamāha - “jayantīmūlaṃ gṛhya tathaiva karttavyaṃ yathā tumbureḥ sarvakarmāṇi sādhayati |
683:80: jayantīmūlaṃ tṛlohapariveṣṭitaṃ kṛtvā puṣyayogena somavāreṇa śuklapakṣasaptamyāṃ sapūrṇamāsyāṃ caturdaśyāṣṭamyāṃ trirātroṣitena śucinā kuṅkumamiśraṃ kṛtvā mukhe prakṣeptavyāḥ |
683:82: svamantraṃ akṣaralakṣaṃ japtvā guḍikāṃ prakṣipya candragrahe mukte vidyādharo bhavati kāmarūpī yatheṣṭagatiḥ viṃśativarṣasahasrāṇi jīvati |
683:84: mānuṣe punaḥ evaṃ sarvakarmāṇi karotī” ti ||
683:86: agastivandākaṃ gṛhya jyeṣṭhodakena divyavāriṇā vā piṣṭvā svamantreṇābhimantrya pādau mrakṣayedyojanaśataṃ gamanāgamanaṃ karoti |
683:92: aparājitā evamāhaṃ - “aparājitāmūlaṃ gṛhya śuklakṛṣṇau sapatraphalamūlau sarvaṃ tathaiva kartavyaṃ yathā sārthavāhasyeti |
683:95: putrañjarī kṛtāñjalī sahā ca sahadevā ca mahoṣadhī |
683:103: akṣamātraṃ tataḥ kṛtvā guṭikāṃ vaktre tuṃ tāṃ nyaset ||
683:108: udgīṇe tathā yuktiḥ svadehī bhavati jāpadhīḥ |
683:109: anyathā yadi vaktrasthā viśvarūpā bhavet sadā ||
683:111: anyathā hṛyate guṭikā yadi rakṣāṃ na karoti jāpī ||
683:121: kurvanti ca sadā martyā tadā teṣāṃ niyojayet ||
683:124: kathitaṃ kathayiṣyanti ye cānye bhuvi mānavāḥ |
683:125: tat sarvaṃ kalpavisaraṃ iha coktaṃ lokamātaraiḥ ||
683:129: adhiṣṭhānāṃ ca buddhānāṃ aśeṣāṇāṃ ca jinātmajām ||
683:133: sādhu sādhu tataḥ kanya samaye tiṣṭhadhva yatnatāmiti ||
683:134: āryamañjuśriyamūlakalpāt bodhisattvapiṭakāvataṃsakāt mahāyānavaipulyasūtrāt saptacatvāriṃśatimaḥ paṭalavisarāt tṛtīyaḥ catuḥkumāryopayikasarvasādhanajapaniyamamudrāoṣadhitantramantrasarvakarmapaṭalavisaraṃ parisamāpta iti ||
